title: A Restoration Mentality | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: A Restoration Mentality | Joel Osteen
description:
In life, sometimes we experience losses or unfair situations. The good news is, God is a God of restoration. He’s not only going to restore what you lost, He’s going to bring you out better than you were before.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
